articles.author: Breitbart Jerusalem
articles.title: Iraq's President Visits Iran Weeks After U.S. Renews Sanctions
articles.description: TEHRAN — Iraq’s President Barham Salih began a visit to Iran on Saturday, where he pledged to improve relations less than two weeks after the United States restored oil sanctions that had been lifted under the 2015 nuclear deal.

articles.description: BASRA, Iraq — Iraqi police say a Muslim cleric has been killed outside his home after he suggested that demonstrators should take up arms over poor public services in Basra.

articles.description: Australian voter support for a lift in immigration of Muslims has collapsed in the wake of last week’s Islamic State-inspired terror attack in Melbourne.

articles.description: PARIS (AFP) — The popularity of French President Emmanuel Macron has dropped to just 25 per cent, according to a major tracker poll published on Sunday.

articles.title: U.S. Opposes Anti-Israel Golan Heights U.N. Draft Resolution
